input: Passage: 'Elephants are large mammals of the family Elephantidae and the order Proboscidea. Elephantidae is the only surviving family of the order Proboscidea; other, now extinct, members of the order include deinotheres, gomphotheres, mammoths, and mastodons.'. Question: 'what is the scientific name of a elephant'.
output: True
